title: 148862945.running On Fumes
excerpt: It’s really hard to focus on craft when you’re burnt out or struggling to meet a deadline.

children.text: It’s really hard to focus on craft when you’re burnt out or struggling to meet a deadline.
Which is why it’s so often better to work on projects well before they're due (to minimize the chance of both).
Working for a few minutes everyday sure beats sprinting at the end.
